org.sdm.spa.actors.transport

Class SftpCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sdm.spa.actors.transport.FileCopierBase
      • org.sdm.spa.actors.transport.SftpCopier

  • public class SftpCopier
extends FileCopierBase
    SFTP provides functionality to copy files, regular expressions, directories(with dir: option). It does not provide list of file/dir/regular expression. To achieve that we loop through list of files and execute sftp copy for each statement.\
    Author:

      • buildSftpWildcardBatch

        public java.lang.String buildSftpWildcardBatch(ConnectionDetails srcDetails,
                                               java.lang.String srcFile,
                                               ConnectionDetails destDetails,
                                               java.lang.String destFile,
                                               boolean recursive,
                                               SftpExec sshObject,
                                               java.lang.String cmdFile)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Anand: Create a command for remote to remote SFTP copy. This function does not copy the command file to remote directory. It just creates echo statement to copy the command file and the command. command format : bash -c 'export PATH=/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/bin:~:.:$PATH; echo -e "put " \n "put " > batchfile; sftp -o "batchmode no" -b -oPort=22 gs3dev@130.20.107.80' The batch file contains series of put/get commands to be executed of sftp prompt.
        Parameters:
        srcDetails - - Source connection details
        srcFile - - Source file name
        destDetails - - Destination connection details
        destFile - - destination file name
        recursive - - true/false for directory
        sshObject - - used to connect to remote machine to get file list matching wildcard
        cmdFile - - batch file name
        Returns:
        String - command which is to be run to copy files
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildSftpCommand

        public java.lang.String buildSftpCommand(ConnectionDetails srcDetails,
                                         java.lang.String srcFile,
                                         ConnectionDetails destDetails,
                                         java.lang.String destFile,
                                         boolean recursive,
                                         SftpExec sshObject,
                                         java.lang.String cmdFile)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Anand: Create a batch file for a file or directory and give that to sftp to perform copy This function creates batch file, and builds sftp copy command and returns it to calling function.
        Parameters:
        srcDetails - - Source connection details
        srcFile - - Source file name
        destDetails - - Destination connection details
        destFile - - destination file name
        recursive - - true/false for directory
        sshObject - - used to connect to remote machine to get file list matching wildcard
        cmdFile - - batch file name
        Returns:
        String : command which is to be run to copy files
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDefaultPort

        protected int getDefaultPort()
        Description copied from class: FileCopierBase
        default port for the file transfer protocol. Child class should either return a specific port number or -1 if it doesn't want to enforce a specific port number
        Specified by:
        getDefaultPort in class FileCopierBase
